verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4467>reign<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5809>Azzur,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was from <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to me in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

<S%H5750>'Within<s%> <S%H8145>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> I am going to <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the Lord's <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3947>away<s%> from <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> and <S%H935>carried<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

'I am also going to <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1546>exiles<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> who <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'for I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>' "

Then the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H5975>standing<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>

and the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H543>"Amen!<s%> May the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so;<s%> may the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6965>confirm<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> to <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the Lord's <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1473>exiles,<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

<S%H389>"Yet<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am about to <S%H1696>speak<s%> in your <S%H241>hearing<s%> and in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people!<s%>

"The <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> me and <S%H6440>before<s%> you from <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H5769>times<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H776>lands<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> and of <S%H9567>calamity<s%> and of <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

"The <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5012>prophesies<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> when the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H935>pass,<s%> then that <S%H5030>prophet<s%> will be <S%H3045>known<s%> [as] one <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H571>truly<s%> <S%H7971>sent.<s%>"
Then <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4133>yoke<s%> from the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> it.

And <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3602>'Even<s%> <S%H3602>so<s%> will I <S%H7665>break<s%> <S%H5750>within<s%> <S%H8145>two<s%> <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> from the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>'" Then the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> his <S%H1870>way.<s%>

And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> had <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>yoke<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1980>"Go<s%> and <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "You have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>yokes<s%> of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> but you have <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of them <S%H4133>yokes<s%> of <S%H1270>iron.<s%> "

'For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "I have <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> on the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> and they shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him. And I have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> him the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>"' "

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H8085>"Listen<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> you, and you have made <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> in a <S%H8267>lie.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I am about to <S%H7971>remove<s%> you from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%> This <S%H8141>year<s%> you are going to <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have <S%H1696>counseled<s%> <S%H5627>rebellion<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>'"
So <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
